titles.title: Supporting the goals and ideals of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Health.

committee.name: House Committee on Energy and Commerce

bill.summary: 9/17/2008--Introduced. Encourages: (1) the President to issue a proclamation in support of Multiple Sclerosis Awareness Week; (2) states and localities to designate such Week; (3) media organizations to participate in such Week and help educate the public about multiple sclerosis.Reaffirms the nation's commitment to combating multiple sclerosis.Recognizes people living with multiple sclerosis and their friends and families and salutes the health care professionals and medical researchers who assist those afflicted and continue to work to find cures and improve treatments.
